row.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" namespace="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/idconnector/resource-schema-1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/common/common-1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="Account"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:identifier xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd" ref="xns1:__UID__"/> <r:secondaryIdentifier xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd" ref="xns1:__NAME__"/> <r:compositeIdentifier xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd" ref="xns0:sn"/> <r:displayName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd" ref="xns0:description"/> <r:descriptionAttribute xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd" ref="xns0:description"/> <r:nativeObjectClass xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">__ACCOUNT__</r:nativeObjectClass> <r:accountType default="true" xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd"/> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="r:ResourceObjectClass" xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element ref="xns1:__NAME__"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">__NAME__</r:nativeAttributeName> <r:attributeDisplayName>Some custom name</r:attributeDisplayName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="ATTR1" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:help xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">DESCRIPTION_NAME_HELP_KEY</r:help> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">ATTR1</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="xns1:__PASSWORD__"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:attributeFlag xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">PASSWORD</r:attributeFlag> <r:classifiedAttribute xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd"> <r:encryption>HASH</r:encryption> <r:classificationLevel>password</r:classificationLevel> </r:classifiedAttribute> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">__PASSWORD__</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="sn" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">sn</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="cn" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">cn</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="groups" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">groups</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="custom" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:attributeFlag xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">IGNORE_ATTRIBUTE</r:attributeFlag> <r:help xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">This attribute part of the SchemaHandling</r:help> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">custom</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element ref="xns1:__UID__"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:attributeFlag xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">NOT_UPDATEABLE</r:attributeFlag> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">__UID__</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="givenName" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">givenName</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="fullName" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:appinfo> <r:help xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">DISPLAY_NAME_HELP_KEY</r:help> <r:nativeAttributeName xmlns:r="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/resource-schema-1.xsd">fullName</r:nativeAttributeName> </xsd:appinfo> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <c:configuration xmlns:c="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/common/common-1.xsd"> <ns2:ConnectorConfiguration xmlns:ns2="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/public/resource/idconnector/configuration-1.xsd"> <ns2:ConnectorRef bundleName="org.identityconnectors.databasetable" bundleVersion="1.1.4958" connectorName="org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector"> <ns2:ConnectorHostRef>/configuration/connectorHost[@oid='1234']/configuration</ns2:ConnectorHostRef> </ns2:ConnectorRef> <ns2:BundleProperties> <iccldap:jdbcDriver xmlns:iccldap="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/resource/idconnector/bundle/org.identityconnectors.databasetable/org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector/1.1.4958">org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver</iccldap:jdbcDriver> <iccldap:jdbcUrlTemplate xmlns:iccldap="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/resource/idconnector/bundle/org.identityconnectors.databasetable/org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector/1.1.4958">jdbc:derby:target/testdb</iccldap:jdbcUrlTemplate> <iccldap:table xmlns:iccldap="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/resource/idconnector/bundle/org.identityconnectors.databasetable/org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector/1.1.4958">account</iccldap:table> <iccldap:keyColumn xmlns:iccldap="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/resource/idconnector/bundle/org.identityconnectors.databasetable/org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector/1.1.4958">id</iccldap:keyColumn> <iccldap:passwordColumn xmlns:iccldap="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/resource/idconnector/bundle/org.identityconnectors.databasetable/org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector/1.1.4958">password</iccldap:passwordColumn> <iccldap:changeLogColumn xmlns:iccldap="http://midpoint.evolveum.com/xml/ns/resource/idconnector/bundle/org.identityconnectors.databasetable/org.identityconnectors.databasetable.DatabaseTableConnector/1.1.4958">changelog</iccldap:changeLogColumn> </ns2:BundleProperties> <ns2:PoolConfigOption minEvictTimeMillis="5000" minIdle="5" maxIdle="30" maxObjects="120" maxWait="5000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeouts> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="create" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="update" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="delete" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="test" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="scriptOnConnector" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="scriptOnResource" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="get" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="authenticate" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="search" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="validate" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="sync" timeout="50000"/> <ns2:OperationTimeout name="schema" timeout="50000"/> </ns2:OperationTimeouts> </ns2:ConnectorConfiguration> </c:configuration>
